remarks: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism depends only on the ring attributes of a structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
zrhpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
zrhpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
zrhpropd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) $.
zrhpropd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( .r ` K ) y ) = ( x ( .r ` L ) y ) ) $.
zrhpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( ZRHom ` K ) = ( ZRHom ` L ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
